summary: Dashboard session-flow initialization logic appears to have been updated to wait for required inputs (identity/status/profile fetch flags) and to avoid restarting an active flow; diff summaries also claim a manual check-in entry point for IDLE. However, several unrelated/documentation-style updates are present in modified summary/state files that are not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated UI/branding and typography changes (e.g., LoginPage headline/tagline/button label; BRUTAL theme styling tokens; multiple component styling updates) not requested by the BuildRequest (which is limited to Dashboard daily session popups and an IDLE fallback action).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only targets fixing Dashboard daily session modal orchestration and adding a manual check-in entry point when IDLE; no request to restyle app, change Login page typography, or update multiple other components.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad project-wide state/feature summary updates describing app capabilities and styling, not requested as part of the fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask to update project metadata/state files.
